title: Restore tiger hero decals and fix soundtrack playback reliability

requirements.summary: Make hero tiger decals render reliably on the initial screen and hide broken images on load failure.
acceptanceCriteria: On a fresh load (before results are shown), the hero section displays two subtle tiger decal images (one top-left, one bottom-right).
The decals load from the exact public paths `/assets/generated/tiger-decal-left.dim_256x256.png` and `/assets/generated/tiger-decal-right.dim_256x256.png` without showing broken-image UI.
If an asset is missing or fails to load, the UI hides the broken image element (no broken-image icon/box is shown).

file_operations.description: Create a small, reusable decorative wrapper that hides itself when the underlying asset fails to load (onError), preventing broken-image UI while keeping layout stable.

Replace the two hero-section raw tiger decals with the new DecorativeImage wrapper so they reliably render on the initial (non-results) screen and automatically hide on load error; keep sources exactly `/assets/generated/tiger-decal-left.dim_256x256.png` and `/assets/generated/tiger-decal-right.dim_256x256.png`. Also wire in the required generated icon asset by rendering `frontend/public/assets/generated/tiger-icon.dim_128x128.png` as a subtle inline hero decoration (non-results screen) using the same broken-image hiding behavior.

requirements.summary: Ensure the required tiger decal static assets exist under the public generated assets directory using exact filenames.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/assets/generated/tiger-decal-left.dim_256x256.png` exists and is served by the frontend.
`frontend/public/assets/generated/tiger-decal-right.dim_256x256.png` exists and is served by the frontend.

file_operations.description: Add the generated left tiger decal image asset at the exact path `frontend/public/assets/generated/tiger-decal-left.dim_256x256.png` so it is served at runtime.
Add the generated right tiger decal image asset at the exact path `frontend/public/assets/generated/tiger-decal-right.dim_256x256.png` so it is served at runtime.
Add the required generated tiger icon asset at the exact path `frontend/public/assets/generated/tiger-icon.dim_128x128.png` so it can be referenced from the UI.

requirements.summary: Fix soundtrack playback so Play produces audible audio, state reflects playback, and failures show a user-facing message.
acceptanceCriteria: When the user clicks the Play button in the header, background music becomes audible within 1 second (assuming the browser/audio is allowed and volume is not muted).
The Play/Pause icon correctly reflects playback state (Play when stopped, Pause when playing).
If playback fails (e.g., browser blocks it or the file is missing), the app shows a clear English, user-facing message indicating audio could not be played (and does not only log to the console).
The audio file is served from `/assets/audio/barrera-healthy-eats-theme.mp3` (frontend static asset), and the Play button uses that file.

file_operations.description: Refactor playback flow to attempt `audio.play()` directly from the user click handler (to satisfy browser autoplay policies) while still loading from `/assets/audio/barrera-healthy-eats-theme.mp3`, keep the Play/Pause icon in sync with actual playback (e.g., via audio events), and display a clear English, user-facing error message in the UI when playback fails or the file cannot be loaded. Use existing shadcn/ui components (Button, Popover, Slider) to present controls and any error messaging; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Ensure the soundtrack MP3 exists in frontend public assets and is served at the exact URL used by the app.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/assets/audio/barrera-healthy-eats-theme.mp3` exists and is served by the frontend at runtime.
Clicking Play does not produce a 404 for `/assets/audio/barrera-healthy-eats-theme.mp3` in the browser network panel.

file_operations.description: Add the soundtrack MP3 at the exact path `frontend/public/assets/audio/barrera-healthy-eats-theme.mp3` so it is served at runtime at `/assets/audio/barrera-healthy-eats-theme.mp3`.
